channel.title: Making a default appearance?

item.title: Making a default appearance?
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

im trying to figure out how to make it where when a player logs in instead of choosing your own looks it will automatically set them to a specific kind. this is for 317 [pi]. i tried messing with the starter package but i couldn’t get anywhere with that. anyone know of how to do this?

QUOTE FROM A TOPIC A LONG TIME AGO

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Made this for ademia, figured I’d put it on here. Doesn’t include any performance benefits, just more organized imo. Note that you’ll have to invoke

Code: [Select]
defaultAppearance()

in your Player class constructor, or your player will be invisible upon logging in for the first time.

With that said, enjoy

Code (Java): [Select]
package server.rs2.players;

/**

  • Handles the values for the players appearance in an organized way

  • @author lare96
    */
    public class Appearance {

     /**
  * 52-byte array that stores the values for the players appearance
  */
 private int[] look = new int[13];

 /**
  * Constants that represent each index in the array and what value should be
  * stored there
  */
 public static final int CHARACTER_ARMS = 0;

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

i think this is what im trying to do but where would i add this heres link to the quote above:
